reviews.review: Great game, bit annoyed that i got nothing from paying for the game before it went free. It is a great game but does have a lot of hackers since they released it for free. I would highly recommend getting prime to avoid hackers. But other wise great game, and the classic toxic community.
Comunidade excessivamente toxicas, principalmente quando tem crianças em jogo... anti- jogo e afins. Nao recomendo. O CS e bom de se jogar. Mas so de pensar na comunidade da tristeza
мне лень писать какая она крутая
挂比不少，游戏又太上头，这是我第3个账号了。只是现在收费有点烦人
傻逼服务器屁事没得 cnm你见过那家服务器可以烂到不管挂什么加速器都能连不进去的 傻逼玩意属实搞人心态 妈的在烂的联通网络都能连进来 没人权是吧 你不管挂我都懒得说 但是你那个垃圾服务器能不能重新换一个 别搞这么寄吧烂 傻逼玩意
A very good game anyone should tryout. It is really challenging and is enjoyable.

¿El juego? Es excelente.
¿Su comunidad? Una de las peores.
El juego es bueno lo malo es el anti-cheats basura que tiene pero de resto pues podría decir que es decente jueguenlo solo si se quieren muy poco
fun game-ish. sometimes you have your days, sometimes you have shit days. its just a gamble at this point :/

wow very good game love so much yeah!
挂满地，没什么好说的，三局一个，五局一堆，十局全是挂，不光大罗金仙，还有装无辜的散仙，怎么玩吗，到了瓶颈，本想好好练，练完实战结果个个职业哥，你怎么就那么准，怎么不去打职业，还在当娱乐玩家，谁不知道你那些小插件，还在这装无辜，自己开就算了，还报给队友，想让他跟你一起没妈啊
